category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_share_related
preference.preference_description: Determines which related objects of a Classification class/view are shared when the class/view is shared. Use this preference with shared Classification functionality. Valid Values: classImage - Shares class images. viewImage - Shares view images. partFamilyTemplates - Shares part family templates.
